snippet: The European Chess Championship went to Azerbaijan for the first time, and Miami won the United States Chess League title for the first time.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain Chess column notes wins by Azerbaijan at European Chess Championships in Warsaw and by the Miami Sharks at their first United States Chess League competition.
lead_paragraph: The European Chess Championship went to Azerbaijan for the first time, and Miami won the United States Chess League title for the first time.

headline.main: Teams From Azerbaijan and Miami Seize Titles
headline.print_headline: Teams From Azerbaijan And Miami Seize Titles
